testcase.classname: To validate the account creation of fb application
testcase.name: To create new account
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and maximize the window.........................passed When To launch url of fb application........................................passed And To click the create new account button..................................passed And To pass firstname in firstname text box.................................passed And To pass secondname in secondname text box...............................passed And To pass mobileno or email in email text box.............................passed And To create new password using new password text box......................passed Then TO close the chrome browser............................................passed
